wip: This boilerplate is currently in WIP
productionReadyDescription: A production-ready Next.js boilerplate with authentication, theming, internationalization, and modern development tools.
everythingYouNeed: Everything you need to build modern apps
preConfiguredDescription: Pre-configured with the best tools and practices. Just clone, customize, and deploy.
lightningFastDescription: Built with Next.js 15, React 19, and optimized for performance with modern build tools.
secureAuthDescription: Better Auth integration with session management, OAuth providers, and security best practices.
beautifulThemesDescription: 8 carefully crafted color themes with dark mode support and customizable design tokens.
databaseReadyDescription: Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL, migrations, and type-safe database operations out of the box.
developerExperienceDescription: TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and modern tooling configured for the best development experience.
mobileFirstDescription: Responsive design, PWA support, and mobile-optimized components using shadcn/ui.
carefullySelectedTools: Carefully selected tools and frameworks for optimal developer experience
cloneRepositoryDescription: Clone the repository and start building your next project with this production-ready boilerplate.
name: Name
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
